title: What to Eat to Boost Your Immune System
description: Emily Ho, Ph.D. shares what a healthy diet should consist of, the importance of supplements and what foods can boost your immune system.
cleaned_text: 10 questions in 10ish minutes with OSU public health and human sciences experts on a topic related to human health and well-being. The new director of the Linus Pauling Institute and professor, [Emily Ho](/people/emily-ho), joins us to talk all things healthy eating. She shares what a healthy diet should consist of, the importance of supplements, and what foods can boost your immune system. Resources mentioned in
